verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to her who is rebellious<WH4754> and polluted,<WH1351> the oppressing<WH3238> city!<WH5892>
She didn't<WH8085> obey the voice.<WH6963> She didn't<WH3947> receive correction.<WH4148> She didn't<WH982> trust in Yahweh.<WH3068> She didn't<WH7126> draw near to her God.<WH430>
Her princes<WH8269> in the midst<WH7130> of her are roaring<WH7580> lions.<WH738> Her judges<WH8199> are evening<WH6153> wolves.<WH2061> They leave nothing<WH1633> until the next day.<WH1242>
Her prophets<WH5030> are arrogant<WH6348> and treacherous<WH900> people.<WH582> Her priests<WH3548> have profaned<WH2490> the sanctuary.<WH6944> They have done violence<WH2554> to the law.<WH8451>

Yahweh,<WH3068> in the midst<WH7130> of her,<WH6662> is righteous. He will do<WH6213> no wrong.<WH5766> Every<WH1242> morning<WH1242> he brings<WH5414> his justice<WH4941> to light.<WH216> He doesn't<WH5737> fail, but the unjust<WH5767> know<WH3045> no shame.<WH1322>

I have cut off<WH3772> nations.<WH1471> Their battlements<WH6438> are desolate.<WH8074> I have made their streets<WH2351> waste,<WH2717> so that no one passes by.<WH5674> Their cities<WH5892> are destroyed,<WH6658> so that there is no man,<WH376> so that there is no inhabitant.<WH3427>

I said,<WH559> "Just fear<WH3372> me.<WH3947> Receive correction,<WH4148> so that her dwelling<WH4583> won't<WH3772> be cut off, according<WH834> to all that I have appointed<WH6485> concerning her.<WH403>" But they rose early<WH7925> and corrupted<WH7843> all their doings.<WH5949>

"Therefore wait<WH2442> for me,<WH5002>" says Yahweh,<WH3068> "until the day<WH3117> that I rise up<WH6965> to the prey,<WH5706> for my determination<WH4941> is to gather<WH622> the nations,<WH1471> that I may assemble<WH6908> the kingdoms,<WH4467> to pour<WH8210> on them my indignation,<WH2195> even all my fierce<WH2740> anger,<WH639> for all the earth<WH776> will be devoured<WH398> with the fire<WH784> of my jealousy.<WH7068>

For then I will<WH2015> purify<WH1305> the lips<WH8193> of the peoples,<WH5971> that they may all call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to serve<WH5647> him shoulder<WH259> to shoulder.<WH7926>
From beyond<WH5676> the rivers<WH5104> of Cush,<WH3568> my worshipers,<WH6282> even the daughter<WH1323> of my dispersed<WH6327> people,<WH2986> will bring my offering.<WH4503>

In that day<WH3117> you will not be disappointed<WH954> for all your doings,<WH5949> in which you have transgressed<WH6586> against me;<WH5493> for then I will take away out of the midst<WH7130> of you your proudly<WH1346> exulting<WH5947> ones,<WH3254> and you will no more be haughty<WH1361> in my holy<WH6944> mountain.<WH2022>
But I will leave<WH7604> in the midst<WH7130> of you an afflicted<WH6041> and poor<WH1800> people,<WH5971> and they will take refuge<WH2620> in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

The remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> will not do<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> nor speak<WH1696> lies,<WH3577> neither will a deceitful<WH8649> tongue<WH3956> be found<WH4672> in their mouth,<WH6310> for they will feed<WH7462> and lie down,<WH7257> and no one will make them afraid.<WH2729>"
Sing,<WH7442> daughter<WH1323> of Zion!<WH6726> Shout,<WH7321> Israel!<WH3478> Be glad<WH8055> and rejoice<WH5937> with all your heart,<WH3820> daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Yahweh<WH3068> has taken away<WH5493> your judgments.<WH4941> He has thrown out<WH6437> your enemy.<WH341> The King<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> Yahweh,<WH3068> is in the midst<WH7130> of you.<WH7200> You will not be afraid of evil any more.<WH7451>
In that day,<WH3117> it will be said<WH559> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> "Don't<WH3372> be afraid, Zion.<WH6726> Don't<WH3027> let your hands be weak.<WH7503>"

Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> is in the midst<WH7130> of you,<WH1368> a mighty one who will save.<WH3467> He will rejoice<WH7797> over you with joy.<WH8057> He will calm<WH2790> you in his love.<WH160> He will rejoice<WH1523> over you with singing.<WH7440>
I will remove<WH622> those who grieve<WH3013> about the appointed feasts<WH4150> from you.<WH4864> They are a burden and a reproach to you.<WH2781>

Behold,<WH6256> at that time I will deal<WH6213> with all those who afflict<WH6031> you,<WH3467> and I will save those who are lame,<WH6760> and gather<WH6908> those who were driven away.<WH5080> I will give<WH7760> them praise<WH8416> and honor,<WH8034> whose shame<WH1322> has been in all the earth.<WH776>

At that time<WH6256> will I bring<WH935> you in,<WH6256> and at that time will I gather<WH6908> you;<WH5414> for I will give you honor<WH8034> and praise<WH8416> among all the peoples<WH5971> of the earth,<WH776> when I restore<WH7725> your fortunes<WH7622> before your eyes,<WH5869> says<WH559> Yahweh.<WH3068>
